data.text:
…Okay, got it. I'm looking forward to it! Fufufuu. 
Alright, just because it's parallel running, 
don't think I'll go easy on you~
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>…Okay, got it. I'm looking forward to it! Fufufuu. 
<story>Alright, just because it's parallel running, 
<story>don't think I'll go easy on you~

data.text:
…Okay! 
Thank you very much…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…Okay! 
<story>Thank you very much…!

data.text:
From that day on, from dawn until dusk, Sakura Chiyono O could be 
seen on the grounds enthusiastically training.
data.processed:
<story>From that day on, from dawn until dusk, Sakura Chiyono O could be 
<story>seen on the grounds enthusiastically training.

data.text:
Alright, starting from tomorrow, I should increase 
the number of rest intervals- Ah, good work!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Alright, starting from tomorrow, I should increase 
<story>the number of rest intervals- Ah, good work!

data.text:
She was eagerly looking at the notebook in her hands, 
the same one she had dropped before- the "ChiyoNote".
data.processed:
<story>She was eagerly looking at the notebook in her hands, 
<story>the same one she had dropped before- the "ChiyoNote".

data.text:
This contains everything I've learned up until this point. If I 
want to fight using everything I have- I figured I should use it.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>This contains everything I've learned up until this point. If I 
<story>want to fight using everything I have- I figured I should use it.

data.text: …If I'm not in it to win it, then, there'd be no point!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…If I'm not in it to win it, then, there'd be no point!

data.text: -And so, the day came.
data.processed: <story>-And so, the day came.

data.text:
Um… T-Today, I'll! Be running… 
as if I'm challenging… the Japan Derby! Please!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Um… T-Today, I'll! Be running… 
<story>as if I'm challenging… the Japan Derby! Please!

data.text:
Fufu, Thanks. Then… 
I'll also be running at full power, okay?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, Thanks. Then… 
<story>I'll also be running at full power, okay?

data.text:
uh…? Hey, look! The ones entering the gate are 
Maruzen-san and… Chiyo-chan?!
data.name: Classmate A
data.processed:
<story>uh…? Hey, look! The ones entering the gate are 
<story>Maruzen-san and… Chiyo-chan?!

data.text:
Here and there the gallery was gathering, the course is turf, 
2400m, counter-clockwise. Sakura Chiyono O's once-in-a-lifetime 
battle was about to begin!
data.processed:
<story>Here and there the gallery was gathering, the course is turf, 
<story>2400m, counter-clockwise. Sakura Chiyono O's once-in-a-lifetime 
<story>battle was about to begin!

data.text: Fu…!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Fu…!

data.text:
Waa, Maruzen-san is pulling farther and farther ahead! But, 
Chiyo-chan is staying really calm. If it was me I'd probably be 
panicking and speeding up…
data.name: Classmate B
data.processed:
<story>Waa, Maruzen-san is pulling farther and farther ahead! But, 
<story>Chiyo-chan is staying really calm. If it was me I'd probably be 
<story>panicking and speeding up…

data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Eh, a plan? That's right… 
I did try giving it a bit of thinking but, well…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Eh, a plan? That's right… 
<story>I did try giving it a bit of thinking but, well…

data.text:
…trying to keep up with Maruzen-san who specializes in a high 
pace escape run, turning it into a battle of attrition wouldn't 
increase my chances of winning.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…trying to keep up with Maruzen-san who specializes in a high 
<story>pace escape run, turning it into a battle of attrition wouldn't 
<story>increase my chances of winning.

data.text:
That's why, no matter how far Maruzen-san pulls ahead, 
I'll continue at my own pace and save my stamina for the end.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>That's why, no matter how far Maruzen-san pulls ahead, 
<story>I'll continue at my own pace and save my stamina for the end.

data.text:
And then… j-just before reaching the last corner 
I'll up my pace, and try to catch up to the escaping Maruzen-san-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>And then… j-just before reaching the last corner 
<story>I'll up my pace, and try to catch up to the escaping Maruzen-san-

data.text:
I'll catch up and then hang on as long as I can, 
and at the end try to pull slightly ahead, no… 
I will pull ahead! Pull ahead and w-…w-win!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>I'll catch up and then hang on as long as I can, 
<story>and at the end try to pull slightly ahead, no… 
<story>I will pull ahead! Pull ahead and w-…w-win!

data.text:
…Honestly, there's alot that I'm lacking. But, if I 
want to win then, this method is the best option I think!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…Honestly, there's alot that I'm lacking. But, if I 
<story>want to win then, this method is the best option I think!

data.text:
(Stay calm, calm down, stay at my pace…! 
Soon, I'll be at the last corner…!)
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>(Stay calm, calm down, stay at my pace…! 
<story>Soon, I'll be at the last corner…!)

data.text: …ku, here! Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…ku, here! Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

data.text:
(…! Amazing acceleration! She was saving that much? 
It's a bit beyond my expectations-)
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>(…! Amazing acceleration! She was saving that much? 
<story>It's a bit beyond my expectations-)

data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
(…I see, Chiyo-chan, you're seriously 
trying to win, aren't you?)
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>(…I see, Chiyo-chan, you're seriously 
<story>trying to win, aren't you?)

data.text: (I've caught up, I need to pull ahead, here, in front…!)
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>(I've caught up, I need to pull ahead, here, in front…!)

data.text: Fufuu, that's good!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, that's good!

data.text: !! —Taaaaaaaaa!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>!! —Taaaaaaaaa!

data.text:
Uwaa, Maruzen-san's acceleration is really crazy…! 
…wait, huh? Chiyo-chan is catching up to her?!
data.name: Classmate A
data.processed:
<story>Uwaa, Maruzen-san's acceleration is really crazy…! 
<story>…wait, huh? Chiyo-chan is catching up to her?!

data.text: …! —Fufuu!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>…! —Fufuu!

data.text:
! —Haaa, haaa! Not yet! 
Not yet, not yet! Not yet, not yet, not yeeeeet!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>! —Haaa, haaa! Not yet! 
<story>Not yet, not yet! Not yet, not yet, not yeeeeet!

data.text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

data.text: …Ha, ha… haaa…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…Ha, ha… haaa…!

data.text:
(…I couldn't reach her. Even with a plan, 
giving it everything I had, even with all that, I still couldn't)
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>(…I couldn't reach her. Even with a plan, 
<story>giving it everything I had, even with all that, I still couldn't)

data.text: (As I thought, she's still, really far away-)
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>(As I thought, she's still, really far away-)

data.text: Chiyo-chan.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Chiyo-chan.

data.text:
Thanks for the fun race! I haven't been that excited 
in a while! …Do your best in the real Japan Derby, 
too. I'll entrust my hopes to you!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Thanks for the fun race! I haven't been that excited 
<story>in a while! …Do your best in the real Japan Derby, 
<story>too. I'll entrust my hopes to you!

data.text:
…Maruzen-san's, hopes… 
…to me?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…Maruzen-san's, hopes… 
<story>…to me?

data.text: Yep. If it wasn't Chiyo-chan, I wouldn't do it.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Yep. If it wasn't Chiyo-chan, I wouldn't do it.

data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: …kusu!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…kusu!

data.text:
I-I was…! O-on the verge of breaking! Chasing after someone as 
imposing as you, I didn't think I could reach!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>I-I was…! O-on the verge of breaking! Chasing after someone as 
<story>imposing as you, I didn't think I could reach!

data.text:
Even while I was running, I was scared, there was no chance I was 
going to win…! But, but, as I thought-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Even while I was running, I was scared, there was no chance I was 
<story>going to win…! But, but, as I thought-

data.text: I-I want to stay by your side!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>I-I want to stay by your side!

data.text: …Yeah.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>…Yeah.

data.text:
For sure… for sure! The "Japan Derby", I'll show you that I can 
win! I'll show you that I can become the strongest Uma Musume!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>For sure… for sure! The "Japan Derby", I'll show you that I can 
<story>win! I'll show you that I can become the strongest Uma Musume!

data.text:
That's why, when that happens, when I become stronger…! 
Will you run another race with me…?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>That's why, when that happens, when I become stronger…! 
<story>Will you run another race with me…?

data.text: …Fufu! Of course!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>…Fufu! Of course!

data.text:
And so, under this clear and sunny sky, 
her once-in-a-lifetime battle, came to a close.
data.processed:
<story>And so, under this clear and sunny sky, 
<story>her once-in-a-lifetime battle, came to a close.

data.text:
With the race over, I started walking 
back to the Trainer's room when-
data.processed:
<story>With the race over, I started walking 
<story>back to the Trainer's room when-

data.text:
Ah, hey, hey hey hey! 
Can you become my trainer?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Ah, hey, hey hey hey! 
<story>Can you become my trainer?

data.text:
It was because of you! Because of you I was able 
to remember my feelings towards Maruzen-san. Because 
you gently pushed me forward…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>It was because of you! Because of you I was able 
<story>to remember my feelings towards Maruzen-san. Because 
<story>you gently pushed me forward…

data.text:
That's why! I'll grow bigger, and the next time I battle 
Maruzen-san, I want you to be there next to me too…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>That's why! I'll grow bigger, and the next time I battle 
<story>Maruzen-san, I want you to be there next to me too…!

data.text:
Because of her earnest attitude, I was thinking that I wanted to 
continue watching over her growth. I had no reason to refuse.

choices.text: I look forward to working with you

data.processed:
<story>Because of her earnest attitude, I was thinking that I wanted to 
<story>continue watching over her growth. I had no reason to refuse.

data.text:
Waaa, I-I did it! Thank you very much! Well then, in that case… 
in commemoration, I'll tell you the proverb I just thought up!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Waaa, I-I did it! Thank you very much! Well then, in that case… 
<story>in commemoration, I'll tell you the proverb I just thought up!

data.text:
"Carrots, never know when it will rain." 
From now on, I look forward to working with you, Trainer-san!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>"Carrots, never know when it will rain." 
<story>From now on, I look forward to working with you, Trainer-san!
